## VectorLayerAdapter.getLayers() method

Allows to get all vector objects of the layer. Does not work for vector tiles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLayers?(): LayerDefinition<F, L>[];
```
**Returns:**

[LayerDefinition](./webmap.layerdefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;F, L&gt;\[\]
